name: Fargana Qasimova
description: '''Fargana Alim qizi Qasimova''' ({{langx|az|Fərqanə Alim qızı Qasımova}}; born August 6, 1979) is an [[Azerbaijanis|Azerbaijani]] [[mugham]] singer in [[Azerbaijan]]. She is the daughter of famous mugham singer [[Alim Qasimov]]. She has twice received presidential awards for the promotion of Azerbaijani music, in 2012 and 2014.
